module.name: DynHashArray
module.short: Module of managing dynamic sets or associative arrays

descr.p: Extends the functionality of Pascal by offering alternative data structure : set like array (the order is not kept) with fast find/delete. Its size can change automatically during the execution of the program. The price is that it is somewhat slower than a number indexes access of an array.
This unit defines TDynHashArray, which is very similar to a TList, since it also stores pointer/objects.
It supports Add, Remove, Contains, First, Count and Clear.
Because of the hashing nature the operations adding, removing and finding is done in constant time on average.
descr.code:
Inner structure: There are three parts: 1. The array itself (FItems). Every entry is a pointer to the first TDynHashArrayItem of a list with the same hash index. The first item of every same index list is the list beginning and its IsOverflow flag is set to false. All other items are overflow items. To get all items with the same hash index, do a FindHashItem. Then search through all "Next" items until Next is nil or its IsOverflow flag is set to false. 2. The items beginning with FFirstItem is a 2-way-connected list of TDynHashArrayItem. This list contains all used items. 3. To reduce GetMem/FreeMem calls, free items are cached.
Issues: The maximum capacity is the PrimeNumber. You can store more items, but the performance decreases. The best idea is to provide your own hash function.
Important: Items in the TDynHashArray must not change their key. When changing the key of an item, remove it and add it after the change.

element.name: TDynHashArray
element.short: Name of the class that store all functions and data for an hashed array.

element.name: THashFunction
element.short: Type for hash function
element.descr: Each hash function specified by the user has to have these parameters

element.name: TDynHashArrayItem.Item
element.short: Pointer to an element to be stored in the array.

element.name: TDynHashArrayItem.Next
element.short: It points to the next element in the doubly linked list.

element.name: TDynHashArrayItem.Prior
element.short: It points to the previous element in the doubly linked list.

element.name: TDynHashArrayItem.IsOverflow
element.short: False if it is the first element of the linked list.

element.name: TDynHashArrayOption
element.short: Options for how this class should work.

element.name: TDynHashArrayOption.dhaoCachingEnabled
element.short: It will use cached result if available in IndexOfKey

element.name: TDynHashArrayOption.dhaoCacheContains
element.short: Turns on a cache for contains operations.

element.name: TDynHashArray
element.short: Implements set/associative array

element.name: TDynHashArray.FItems
element.short: Array pointing to link lists

element.name: TDynHashArray.FCount
element.short: Number of elements stored

element.name: TDynHashArray.FMinCapacity
element.short: The minimum number of items that will be allocated for an array.
element.descr: The size of the array can be changed anytime. However, even if a size is given by FCapacity is smaller than this minimum number, then this minimum number of items will be allocated. This is done for efficiency and speed.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FMaxCapacity
element.short: The size of the array cannot be larger than this number.
element.descr: FCapacity is overridden by this number, if that is larger than this.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FHashCacheItem
element.short: It contains the cached key.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FHashCacheIndex
element.short: It contains the cached index derived from the key.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FLowWaterMark
element.short: The lower element limit for reallocation.
element.descr: The number of elements allocated are halved if the number of elements in the array goes below this number.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FHighWaterMark
element.short: The upper element count limit for reallocation.
element.descr: The number of elements allocated are doubled if the number of elements in the array reaches this number.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FCustomHashFunction
element.short: The pointer to the user-defined hash function.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FOnGetKeyForHashItem
element.short: Optional user-defined function for converting keys.

element.name: TDynHashArray.FOwnerHashFunction
element.short: Optional user-defined hash function which can be SlowAlternativeHashMethod.

element.name: TDynHashArray.SetCapacity
element.short: Changes the number of items (pre-)allocated.

element.name: TDynHashArray.SetCustomHashFunction
element.short: Specify your own hash function to be used by the class.
element.descr: The hash function has to convert a string into a number in a random fashion.

element.name: TDynHashArray.RebuildItems
element.short: Rebuilds the internal datastructures.
element.descr: It is called anytime when there is a change that makes it necessary. E.g. hash function changes or because of dynamic reallocation.

element.name: TDynHashArray.SaveCacheItem
element.short: Sets the cache.
element.descr: The cache is set as given by the parameters.

element.name: TDynHashArray.Add
element.short: Adds an item to the set/array.

element.name: TDynHashArray.Contains
element.short: Returns true if the item is in the set.

element.name: TDynHashArray.ContainsKey
element.short: Returns true if the item is in the set.(through OnGetKeyForHashItem)

element.name: TDynHashArray.Remove
element.short: Removes an element from the set/hash array

element.name: TDynHashArray.Clear
element.short: Removes all elements from the set/hash array

element.name: TDynHashArray.ClearCache
element.short: Clears the FContainsCache cache

element.name: TDynHashArray.First
element.short: Returns the first item or nil

element.name: TDynHashArray.Count
element.short: Number of elements stored in the set/array.

element.name: TDynHashArray.IndexOf
element.short: Returns calculated index from Item through OnGetKeyForHashItem

element.name: TDynHashArray.IndexOfKey
element.short: Returns calculated index from Item
element.descr: It uses user-defined hash functions or built-in algorithm

element.name: TDynHashArray.FindHashItem
element.short: Finds an item as PDynHashArrayItem among all items

element.name: TDynHashArray.FindHashItemWithKey
element.short: Finds an item as PDynHashArrayItem among all items (through OnGetKeyForHashItem)

element.name: TDynHashArray.FindItemWithKey
element.short: Finds an item among all items (through OnGetKeyForHashItem)

element.name: TDynHashArray.GetHashItem
element.short: Gets a link list from the "main" array FItems by index
element.descr: So it returns a link list which can be processed.

element.name: TDynHashArray.Delete
element.short: Deletes a PDynHashArrayItem from link list

element.name: TDynHashArray.AssignTo
element.short: Copies all items into a given TList

element.name: TDynHashArray.SlowAlternativeHashMethod
element.short: Another hash function that can be used.

element.name: TDynHashArray.ConsistencyCheck
element.short: Check if data in TDynHashArray are ok
element.descr: Returns a number indicating the nature of inconsistency. 0 means OK.

element.name: TDynHashArray.WriteDebugReport
element.short: Prints out essential data to aid debugging TDynHashArray.

element.name: TDynHashArray.MinCapacity
element.short: The minimum number of items that will be allocated for an array.
element.descr: The size of the array can be changed anytime. However, even if a size is given by FCapacity is smaller than this minimum number, then this minimum number of items will be allocated. This is done for efficiency and speed.

element.name: TDynHashArray.MaxCapacity
element.short: The size of the array cannot be larger than this number.
element.descr: FCapacity is overridden by this number, if that is larger than this.

element.name: TDynHashArray.Capacity
element.short: Space is allocated for this number of items.

element.name: TDynHashArray.CustomHashFunction
element.short: The pointer to the user-defined hash function.

element.name: TDynHashArray.OwnerHashFunction
element.short: THe pointer to the user-defined hash function.

element.name: TDynHashArray.OnGetKeyForHashItem
element.short: User-defined function to obtain a key from an item
element.descr: If this function is specified,then it is possible to use this class as an associative array. Otherwise, it implements a set.

element.name: TDynHashArrayItemMemManager.WriteDebugReport
element.short: Prints out essential data to aid debugging DynHashArrayItemMemManager.

element.name: EDynHashArrayException
element.short: Raised if index is invalid in IndexOfKey.
element.descr: The index can be invalid if user-defined/custom function are faulty.

element.name: ItemMemManager
element.short: A small memory manager
